title: Adding test cases for RaftServerFactory
description:
Why you need it?

测试用例需要覆盖init方法和start，以及raftserver中的close方法被调用
The test case needs to cover the init method and start, as well as the close method in raftserver being called

How it could be?

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. You can explain more about input of the feature, and output of it.

Other related information

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
